basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period June

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning the side branches at the top canopy, thin the branches growing at the same time as the top section of main stem
